name: 楊勝明
objective: 此課程包含以下主題：(1)直流馬達、伺服馬達、及永磁交流馬達的建模、控制系統設計與模擬，(2)馬達速度及位置觀測器設計與模擬，(3)數位控制及驅動器設計與模擬。
schedule:
1. introduction of Matlab/Simulink, DC Motor model
2. DC motor current control, pole-zero, frequency domain design
3. velocity and position control, tuning
4. Alternative Position Control Strategies
5. Integral Windup and Anti-windup Methods
6. Digital Position Control with Analog Current Control
7. Digital Position and Current Control with PWM
8. Mid-term exam
9. IPM-PMSM motor model
10. PMSM current control
11. Velocity control and SPWM
12. Voltage limitation and SVPWM, circle plots
13. Field weakening control
14. Velocity estimation from back-emf
15. Sensorless velocity control
16. Final Exam.
17. (Final exam. week)
scorePolicy:
Lab: 70% (For each Lab, Completion 80%, Lab. Report 20%)
Mid-term exam: 15%
Final exam: 15%
materials:
1.Control System Design Guide, 3th Editions, George Ellis, Elsevier-Academic Press.
2.Observers in Control Systems, George Ellis, Elsevier-Academic Press.
3.Permanent Magnet Synchronous and Brushless DC Motor Drives, Ramu Krishnan, CRC Press 2010.
4.Control of Electric Machine Drive Systems, Seung-Ki Sul, IEEE Press, 2012.
